item.title: GFW blocks the rendering of page
item.description: Today more and more people and organizations are focusing on improving web performance. One of the most important benchmark is rules for high performance web pages, which are summarized by Yahoo web performance team. Rule #6 “Put scripts at the bottom” is the one we couldn’t be more familiar with. But ironically, many websites, even who advocate for high web performance, go against with this rule, and cause fatal experience defect in certain circumstances...
